---
# This file is autogenerated
---

# Hydra CLI Reference

## `hydra lp`

```shell
hydra liquidity-pools

Manage liquidity pools

Commands:
  hydra lp add-liquidity            Add Liquidity
  hydra lp initialize-global-state  Initialize Global State
  hydra lp initialize-pool-state    Initialize Pool
  hydra lp inspect                  Inspect account
  hydra lp lsa                      List accounts
  hydra lp ls                       List pools
  hydra lp remove-liquidity         Remove Liquidity
  hydra lp set-feature              Set Feature
  hydra lp set-limits               Set Limits
  hydra lp set-prices-owner         Set Prices Owner
  hydra lp swap                     Swap tokens
  hydra lp transfer-global-admin    Transfer global admin ownership
  hydra lp transfer-pool-admin      Transfer pool admin ownership

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
```

## `hydra lp add-liquidity`

```shell
hydra lp add-liquidity

Add Liquidity

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --tokenXMint      Token X Mint address                     [string] [required]
  --tokenYMint      Token Y Mint address                     [string] [required]
  --poolId          The pool index id                        [number] [required]
  --tokenXAmount    The amount of token X you wish to add to the pool in
                    non-divisable units                      [number] [required]
  --tokenYAmount    The amount of token Y you wish to add to the pool in
                    non-divisable units                      [number] [required]
  --slippage                                                            [number]
```

```shell
                    transaction.                                        [string]
```

## `hydra lp initialize-pool-state`

```shell
hydra lp initialize-pool-state

Initialize Pool

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --feeCalculation                                 [string] [default: "Percent"]
  --feeLastUpdate                                          [number] [default: 0]
  --feeLastPrice                                           [number] [default: 0]
  --feeEwmaWindow                                       [number] [default: 3600]
  --feeLastEwma                                     [number] [default: 17836758]
  --feeLambda                                   [number] [default: 545000000000]
  --feeVelocity                                   [number] [default: 4166666667]
  --feeMinPct                                      [number] [default: 500000000]
  --feeMaxPct                                    [number] [default: 20000000000]
  --tokenXMint                                               [string] [required]
  --tokenYMint                                               [string] [required]
  --cValue                                                 [number] [default: 0]
  --priceAccountX                                                       [string]
  --priceAccountY                                                       [string]
```

```shell
hydra lp inspect

Inspect account

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --poolId                                                              [number]
  --data                                                               [boolean]
```

```shell
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the

  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.

  --tokenYMint                                                          [string]

```

## `hydra lp ls`

```shell
hydra lp ls

List pools

Options:
      --help            Show help                                      [boolean]
      --version         Show version number                            [boolean]
      --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
      --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
      --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the
                        command will propose a multisig transaction instead of
                        sending the transaction directly to the chain.  [string]
      --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig
                        safe. This will be the account that will be the actor
                        for the transaction.                            [string]
  -a, --all                                                            [boolean]
      --start                                                           [number]
      --limit                                                           [number]
```

## `hydra lp remove-liquidity`

```shell
hydra lp remove-liquidity

Remove Liquidity

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --tokenXMint      Token X Mint address                     [string] [required]
  --tokenYMint      Token Y Mint address                     [string] [required]
  --poolId          The pool index id                        [number] [required]
  --lpTokensToBurn  The number of lpTokens you wish to send to the contract in
                    non divisable units.                     [number] [required]
```

## `hydra lp set-feature`

```shell
hydra lp set-feature

Set Feature

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --enable                                                             [boolean]
  --disable                                                            [boolean]
  --type
     [string] [required] [choices: "add-liquidity", "all", "create-public-pool",
                                                     "remove-liquidity", "swap"]
```

## `hydra lp set-limits`

```shell
hydra lp set-limits

Set Limits

Options:
  --help                Show help                                      [boolean]
  --version             Show version number                            [boolean]
  --network             The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation      The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe        An address of a multisig safe. When specified the
                        command will propose a multisig transaction instead of
                        sending the transaction directly to the chain.  [string]
  --multisigActor       An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig
                        safe. This will be the account that will be the actor
                        for the transaction.                            [string]
  --poolId              The pool index id                    [number] [required]
  --enabled             Flag to enable or disable limits.   [boolean] [required]
  --liquidityTokenXMax  Maximum amount of token X that can be added or removed
                        from a liquidity pool.               [number] [required]
  --liquidityTokenYMax  Maximum amount of token Y that can be added or removed
                        from a liquidity pool.               [number] [required]
  --swapTokenXMax       Maximum amount of token X that can be swapped in a
                        liquidity pool.                      [number] [required]
  --swapTokenYMax       Maximum amount of token Y that can be swapped in a
                        liquidity pool                       [number] [required]
```

## `hydra lp set-prices-owner`

```shell
hydra lp set-prices-owner

Set Prices Owner

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --owner           The new owner of all price feed accounts [string] [required]
```

## `hydra lp swap`

```shell
hydra lp swap

Swap tokens

Options:
  --help              Show help                                        [boolean]
  --version           Show version number                              [boolean]
  --network           The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation    The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe      An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                      will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                      transaction directly to the chain.                [string]
  --multisigActor     An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                      This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                      transaction.                                      [string]
  --tokenXMint        Token X Mint address                   [string] [required]
  --tokenYMint        Token Y Mint address                   [string] [required]
  --poolId            The pool index id                      [number] [required]
  --userFromToken     ATA holding the tokens to send         [string] [required]
  --userToToken       ATA to recieve the converted token     [string] [required]
  --amountIn          The amount of the sending token you wish to swap in
                      non-divisable units.                   [number] [required]
  --minimumAmountOut  The minimum amount you expect to receive including
                      slippage in non-divisable units.       [number] [required]
```

## `hydra lp transfer-global-admin`

```shell
hydra lp transfer-global-admin

Transfer global admin ownership

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --admin           The new admin                            [string] [required]
```

## `hydra lp transfer-pool-admin`

```shell
hydra lp transfer-pool-admin

Transfer pool admin ownership

Options:
  --help            Show help                                          [boolean]
  --version         Show version number                                [boolean]
  --network         The network to connect to
             [string] [choices: "devnet", "localnet", "mainnet-beta", "testnet",
                                           "fake-mainnet"] [default: "localnet"]
  --walletLocation  The location of your filesystem wallet
                                  [string] [default: "~/.config/solana/id.json"]
  --multisigSafe    An address of a multisig safe. When specified the command
                    will propose a multisig transaction instead of sending the
                    transaction directly to the chain.                  [string]
  --multisigActor   An address of the multisig actor inside the multisig safe.
                    This will be the account that will be the actor for the
                    transaction.                                        [string]
  --admin           The new admin                            [string] [required]
  --poolId          Pool Id index                            [number] [required]
```
